attributes.action: Debate in Parliament whether CBE's and other honors should/can be revoked
attributes.additional_details:
This is a general discussion that should be debated in Parliament.
It is not focused on individuals or personal.
It is required for the UK population to regain faith in the honours system.
attributes.background: Debate in Parliament whether CBE's and other honors should be revoked where miscarriages of justice or dishonesty has occurred

rejection.details:
An honour can be withdrawn (or ‘forfeited’) for a variety of reasons, including criminal conviction and bringing the honours system into disrepute.

You can find out more about arrangements for someone to have an honour remove here: https://honours.cabinetoffice.gov.uk/how-to-nominate/forfeiture/
